title: Dee Dee Thai
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Thai restaurant with a wide range of vegetarian and vegan dishes. All curries can be made with tofu, mock duck, vegetables or mushrooms and all stir fry with tofu, mock duck, vegetables or aubergine. There are also several soups and starters where veggie choices are marked, however, oyster sauce is included in some but only where specifically stated on the menu. The staff are helpful and happy to answer any questions about the food.
